actionCards.searchByLocationDesc: Explore listings by city, neighborhood, or even near specific medical institutions.
actionCards.browseByMapDesc: Visually find properties in your desired area using our interactive map search.
actionCards.listPropertyDesc: Reach qualified tenants in the medical community by listing your rental with us.

faq.title: Need Help? Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I list my rental property on Rentals.ca?
faq.a1: Sign up or log in as a landlord. You can then easily create and publish your rental listing in minutes through our user-friendly dashboard.
faq.q2: Are there any fees for tenants to use Rentals.ca?
faq.a2: No! Searching for properties, viewing listings, and applying for rentals are completely free for tenants.
faq.a3: RentReport‚Ñ¢ is a service offered by Rentals.ca that allows tenants to report their rent payments to credit bureaus, helping them build their credit history.
faq.q4: How can I find rentals near a specific hospitalsor schools?
faq.a4: Use our advanced search filters or browse our dedicated sections for rentals near medical institutions and schools. You can also search by address or landmark.

howToListProperty.question: How do I list my property?
howToListProperty.answer: Click on 'Post a Rental' and follow the steps to add your property details, photos, and contact information.

howToContactLandlord.question: How do I contact a landlord?
howToContactLandlord.answer: Use the contact form on the property listing page to send a message directly to the landlord.

isInformationSecure.question: Is my information secure?
isInformationSecure.answer: Yes, we use industry-standard security measures to protect your data.

howToVerifyIdentity.question: How do I verify my identity as a landlord?
howToVerifyIdentity.answerEnd: page to start the verification process.

footer.disclaimer: Disclaimer: Rentals.ca is not responsible for the accuracy of information provided by landlords or users. Always verify information independently and take precautions to avoid scams.

landlordPage.heroTitle: It's Time To List Your Property
landlordPage.heroSubtitle: Thousands of apartments, houses, and condos for rent across Canada.
landlordPage.visitorsSubtitle: every day to find their new home.
landlordPage.helpDescription: With over 20 years of expertise, Rentals.ca is dedicated to serving landlords, property managers, and renters nationwide. Join Canada's favourite platform for renters to discover your property effortlessly.
landlordPage.plansSubtitle: Upgrade Your Listing to Move Faster
landlordPage.customersSubtitle: What other landlords like you have to say
landlordPage.testimonial1: Great rental site. Got lots of leads. I like that you can pause an advert. It saves a lot of time with a rental that gets re-listed every year. Information about the neighbourhood is a smart feature for prospective tenants.
landlordPage.testimonial2: The platform is easy to use and helped me find reliable tenants quickly. The support team was responsive and helpful throughout the process.
landlordPage.testimonial3: I appreciate the detailed analytics and the ability to manage multiple listings in one place. Highly recommended for busy landlords!

contactUsPage.title: Contact Us
contactUsPage.subtitle: Have a question, need support, or want to partner with us? Our team is here to help you. Reach out and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

termsPage.title: Terms & Conditions
termsPage.welcome: Welcome to our website. By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.
termsPage.acceptanceDesc: By using this site, you agree to comply with and be legally bound by these terms. If you do not agree, please do not use our service.
termsPage.useOfServiceDesc: You agree to use the service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with all applicable laws and regulations.
termsPage.intellectualPropertyDesc: All content, trademarks, and data on this site are the property of their respective owners. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without permission.
termsPage.limitationOfLiabilityDesc: We are not liable for any damages or losses resulting from your use of this site or service.
termsPage.changesToTermsDesc: We reserve the right to update these terms at any time. Continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
termsPage.contactDesc: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us at

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.welcome: Welcome to our privacy policy. This document explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacyPage.informationCollectionDesc: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, submit forms, or contact us.
privacyPage.informationUseDesc: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, communicate with you, and ensure security.
privacyPage.informationSharingDesc: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as required by law.
privacyPage.dataSecurityDesc: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction.
privacyPage.cookiesDesc: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience and analyze site usage.
privacyPage.contactDesc: If you have questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at

importantInfo.whoShouldUseDesc: Tenants who wish to end their tenancy agreement must complete and submit this form to their landlords.
importantInfo.noticePeriodDesc: You must provide at least 60 days notice before the termination date, unless otherwise agreed.
importantInfo.legalImplicationsDesc: Ending your tenancy without proper notice may result in legal or financial consequences.

aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.description: Welcome to our platform! We connect medical professionals, students, and landlords with quality rental properties across Canada. Our mission is to make finding and listing rentals easy, secure, and community-focused.

demo.title: Trustii Human Resources Verification
demo.description: Comprehensive background verification system for employment screening, identity verification, criminal background checks, and education verification.
demo.configurationError: Trustii API is not properly configured. Please set the following environment variables:
demo.createDescription: Fill out the form below to initiate a comprehensive background verification. This will create a new inquiry that will be processed by Trustii.
demo.retrieveDescription: Enter an inquiry ID to retrieve the verification results and detailed report.
demo.employmentDesc: Verify employment history, positions, dates, and salary information
demo.identityDesc: Confirm personal information and address verification
demo.criminalDesc: Comprehensive criminal background checks and record searches
demo.educationDesc: Verify educational credentials, degrees, and graduation dates
